casebody.data:
PHILIP MORRIS USA, INC., petitioner,
v.
Leon BARBANELL, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Shirley Barbanell, Deceased. No. 13-1180. Supreme Court of the United States June 9, 2014.

Case below, 100 So.3d 152.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District, denied.
